i1.blurb: Every 10 seconds, Nocturne's next attack strikes surrounding enemies for 120% physical damage and heals himself. Nocturne's basic attacks reduce this cooldown by 1 second.
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Nocturne's''' [[basic attack]] is periodically enhanced, dealing {{as|120% AD}} {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} to his target and to surrounding enemies, while also {{tip|healing}} himself for {{pp|15 to 40}} {{as|(+ 15% AP)}} per enemy hit.
''Umbra Blades'' can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} to the primary target dealing {{as|{{critical damage|10}} AD}} {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}.
Basic attacks reduce '''Umbra Blades'''' {{sti|cooldown}} by 1 second, increased to 2 seconds against enemy champions.
i1.name: Umbra Blades
notes: * Basic attacks against structures will reduce ''Umbra Blades' ''cooldown but will not trigger the {{tip|splash damage}}.
* The enhanced attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s (only to main target) and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.

q1.blurb: Nocturne throws a shadow blade that deals damage, leaves a Dusk Trail, and causes champions to leave a Dusk Trail. While on the trail, Nocturne can move through units and has increased Movement Speed and Attack Damage.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nocturne''' sends out a shadow blade in a line that leaves a ''Dusk Trail'' on its path, dealing {{as|physical damage}} to enemies it passes through and causing enemy {{tip|champion|champions}} hit to also leave a ''Dusk Trail'' behind their movement for 5 seconds.
While on the ''Dusk Trail'', '''Nocturne''' is {{tip|Ghosted|ghosted}} and gains {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} and {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}.
q1.name: Duskbringer
notes: * '''Duskbringer's''' ''Dusk Trail'' will 'reveal' the path of affected units until its duration ends. This means it can indirectly show the location of any affected units without vision on them, including those in stealth.
* With the {{as|bonus AD}} from the ''Dusk Trail'', the effective base damage is {{ap|65+0.75*20 to 245+0.75*60}}
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the damage and also prevent the ''Dusk Trail''.

w1.blurb: Nocturne empowers his blades, passively gaining Attack Speed. Activating Shroud of Darkness allows Nocturne to fade into the shadows, creating a magical barrier which blocks a single enemy ability and doubles his passive Attack Speed if successful.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Nocturne''' empowers his blades, permanently gaining {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}}.
Blocking an ability will double ''Shroud of Darkness' ''passive {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} for 5 seconds.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Attack Speed|{{ap|20 to 40}}%|Maximum Bonus Attack Speed|{{ap|20*2 to 40*2}}%}}
w1.name: Shroud of Darkness
notes: * ''Shroud of Darkness'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Nocturne's'' previous orders.
* If ''Shroud of Darkness'' is active when '''Nocturne''' re-casts {{ai|Paranoia|Nocturne}} to dash to a target, it'll stay active until '''Nocturne''' reaches his target.

e1.blurb: Nocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing damage each second and terrifying the target if they do not get out of range by the end of the duration.
description: {{sbc|Passive:}} '''Nocturne''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|335 '''bonus''' movement speed}}}} when moving toward {{tip|flee|fleeing}} targets.
{{sbc|Active:}} '''Nocturne''' plants nightmares into his target's mind, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} over 2 seconds and forming a tether between him and his target.
If the target does not break the tether by moving out of range, they are made to {{tip|Flee|flee}} from '''Nocturne''' for a short duration while {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 90%.
e1.name: Unspeakable Horror
notes: * ''Unspeakable Horror'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Nocturne's'' previous orders.
* ''Unspeakable Horror's'' tether will not break if the target enters {{tip|invisibility|stealth}} or becomes {{tip|untargetable}}.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the tether but not the {{tip|flee|fear}} from one already present.

r1.blurb: Nocturne reduces the sight radius of all enemy champions and removes their ally vision in the process. He can then launch himself at a nearby enemy champion.
description: {{sbc|First Active:}} After a brief delay, '''Nocturne''' applies {{tip|nearsight}} to all enemy champions for 6 seconds.

{{sbc|Second Active:}} While ''Paranoia'' is active, '''Nocturne''' can reactivate it to {{tip|dash}} {{tip|unstoppable|unstoppably}} to the target enemy champion, dealing them {{as|physical damage}}.
r1.name: Paranoia
notes: * ''Paranoia's'' {{tip|nearsight}} has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Nocturne's'' previous orders.
* ''Paranoia's'' nearsight can be blocked by spell shields.

* ''Nocturne'' will track targets that change locations (moving, [[dash]]ing, {{si|Flash|flashing}}) but not those that cover great distances ({{si|Recall|recalling}}, {{si|Teleport|teleporting}}) in which case he will dash to their previous location.
* ''Paranoia's'' {{tip|Nearsight|nearsight}} will prevent an enemy {{ci|Shen}} from using {{ai|Stand United|Shen}} on allies (regardless of having {{tip|sight}} of them or not) while active.
